participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is a caring and family-oriented individual who enjoys spending time with her siblings. She's often seen as the peacemaker in her family and has a great love for animals, particularly dogs.
participant_1.background: i have one brother. i have three sisters. i love dogs. i live in alabama.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is nurturing and empathetic, with a passion for helping others, which reflects in her job as a nurse. She has a cheerful disposition and enjoys magical experiences, especially those related to Disney.
participant_2.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.
